title: The life and correspondence of Andrew Combe ...
author: Combe, George
snippet: Dr Combe's correspondence was long circumscribed by this illness, and no letters requiring notice appear to have been written by him, till the 14th of July, when he addressed a few lines to his brother George, then at Godesberg on the Rhine, mentioning that he hoped to pay a visit to Mrs Hannay at Robgill Tower, an old border-castle near Annan, and afterwards to go to For-
